Constructor Detail

UdpConnection

public UdpConnection(int localPort,
                     java.lang.String host,
                     int remotePort)
              throws java.net.SocketException
Creates an new connections and opens a socket with the given params.

Parameters:
localPort - - The port this connection should send and listen on.
host - - The target of the connection. The remote host.
remotePort - - The port of the target of this connection.
Throws:
java.net.SocketException - - If the connection to the host failed.

                                throws java.io.IOException
Sends a String with data to the remote host and waits for an answer.

Parameters:
message - - The message to send.
Returns:
- The reply from the remote host.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If the connection to the remote host failed.
